description: Marketing an app is a brand new world that might seem intimidating to any developer or entrepreneur, but is one of the most important steps on your app's life. You might be tempted to hire a designer and a video agency to create your marketing materials, but it would be an expensive endeavor. This course will help you create beautiful marketing materials for your app marketing efforts with the smallest of budgets. We will cover how to make stunning mockups and images, professional demo videos with voiceover narration and landing pages to drive traffic to.You should expect very basic terminology, as we will explain everything you need to know in the easiest terms. The idea is to finish this course in a couple of hours and end up with all the marketing collateral that you'll need to properly showcase and sell your app.
title: Put Together Your App's Marketing Materials
